title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage GGUF models locally with a built-in Modelfile DSL.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers (fetch-based) to chat, generate, and manage models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model with multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library providing typed APIs and reactive streaming for Ollama.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed, async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s sidebar chat.

title: ollama-model-librarian
summary: CLI utility to batch-download, tag, and organize GGUF models from Hugging Face into Ollama.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop app for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that registers Ollama models as generators and embedders for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling options.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI (built with Charm Bubble Tea) for multi-turn chat sessions against Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK providing async/await wrappers and strongly-typed request/response objects for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference repo showing how to build a private RAG stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and common models for reproducible, declarative local deployments.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with thread support.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that streams Ollama responses with session memory and model picker.
